text: Arturo Cambroni (born 3 January 1953) is a Mexican cyclist. He competed in the sprint and 1000m time trial events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Mexico Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Michoacán
title: Arturo Cambroni
